content: I am trying to find a way to do some text banking for the campaign.  I did some training for the phone banking but am having extreme anxiety about talking to people on the phone.  Does anyone have information on how to send texts instead?
It looks like our next text training event is tonight.  Here is the link: https://events.democrats.org/event/672393/?force_banner=true&share_context=event_details&share_medium=copy_link
